entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:07 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
